ca.mcgill.hs.plugin
Class SensorLogger

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.hs.plugin.InputPlugin
      ca.mcgill.hs.plugin.SensorLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.hardware.SensorEventListener, Plugin
public class SensorLogger
extends InputPlugin
implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener

An InputPlugin which gets data from the phone's hardware sensors.

onAccuracyChanged

public void onAccuracyChanged(android.hardware.Sensor sensor,
                              int accuracy)
This method gets called automatically whenever a sensor's accuracy has changed. We currently ignore this event.

Specified by:
onAccuracyChanged in interface android.hardware.SensorEventListener
Parameters:
sensor - The SensorEvent detailing the change in sensor data.
accuracy - The new accuracy.
